definition: (of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

sentences.english: BACKGROUND To observe the therapeutic effects of transplantation of conjunctival flap for pterygium.
sentences.chinese: 觀察單純結膜瓣移植治療翼狀胬肉的療效。

sentences.english: It can fetch relief in both conjunctivitis and glaucoma.
sentences.chinese: 它可以取救濟兩種結膜炎和青光眼。

sentences.english: METHODS. Primary human conjunctival mast cells and epithelial cells were obtained from cadaveric conjunctival tissue.
sentences.chinese: 人結膜肥大細胞和上皮細胞從屍體結膜組織獲得。

sentences.english: METHODS. Primary human conjunctival mast cells and epithelial cells were obtained from cadaveric conjunctival tissue.
sentences.chinese: 人結膜肥大細胞和上皮細胞從屍體結膜組織獲得。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss CT features of patients with spontaneous subconjunctival orbital fat prolapse.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討原發性結膜下眶脂肪脫垂的CT表現。

sentences.english: K19 was obsevred mainly in the epithelium on the fornix and the bulbar conjunctiva.
sentences.chinese: K19主要表達在穹窿部及球結膜上皮細胞。

sentences.english: Must not go to briny lane in the eye, lest cause eye conjunctiva loss.
sentences.chinese: 千萬不要把鹽水弄到眼睛裏去，以免造成眼結膜損傷。

sentences.english: Viral conjunctivitis can spread to the cornea, the white of the eye.
sentences.chinese: 病毒性結膜炎可以蔓延到角膜，白色的眼睛。

sentences.english: Bulbar conjunctiva may act as a local lymph node of Mooren's ulcer.
sentences.chinese: 蠶蝕性角膜潰瘍的球結膜可能起着局部淋巴結作用。

sentences.english: Repeated infection and inflammation lead to scarring of the conjunctiva, which may eventually cause the eyelid to turn inwards.
sentences.chinese: 反覆感染和炎症導致結膜瘢痕，其最終可導致瞼內翻。

sentences.english: Male and old age were the risk factors to higher aerobic conjunctival flora.
sentences.chinese: 高齡和男性是結膜囊帶菌量較高的危險因素。

sentences.english: These eyedrops are very effective in treating conjunctivitis.
sentences.chinese: 這種眼藥水對治療結膜炎很有效。

sentences.english: Subsequent examination showed the cause was infestation with Thelazia species.
sentences.chinese: 後續的檢查發現是眼結膜吸允線蟲的感染。

sentences.english: Bacterial conjunctivitis is a microbial infection involving the mucous membrane on the surface of the eye.
sentences.chinese: 細菌性結膜炎是一種影響眼表粘膜的微生物感染。

sentences.english: K14 was mainly in the epithelial layer of palpebral mucocutaneous junction and palpebral conjunctiva.
sentences.chinese: K14表達在瞼緣皮膚粘膜交界處及瞼結膜上皮細胞。

sentences.english: They are caused by bleeding between the conjunctiva and the sclera.
sentences.chinese: 它們是由結膜和鞏膜間的出血造成的。

definition: choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)
